attributes.description: Compendium of flattened terminologies of archetypes  referenced from this template, keyed by archetype identifier. This will almost always be present in a template.
attributes.name: component_terminologies

attributes.description: Compendium of flattened terminology extracts (i.e. from external terminologies) from archetypes referenced from this template, keyed by archetype identifier.
attributes.name: terminology_extracts

meta_info.description: Root object of an operational template. An operational template is derived from a `TEMPLATE` definition and the `ARCHETYPEs` and/or `TEMPLATE_OVERLAYs` mentioned by that template by a process of flattening, and potentially removal of unneeded languages and terminologies.
meta_info.name: OPERATIONAL_TEMPLATE
